summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Buena Vista Addition No. 2 being the alley between 27th Avenue West and 28th Avenue West from West Bertona Street to West Dravus Street; and certain other streets and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16984 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
